admin.title: Administration Portal

app.title: Car Reservations
app.description: Book and manage your car reservations

dashboard.manageReservationsBookings: Manage your vehicle reservations and bookings

profile.emailUpdated: Email updated successfully. Please check your new email for verification.
profile.changePasswordDesc: Update your password to keep your account secure

fleet.subtitle: Manage your vehicle fleet, track availability, and update car status.
fleet.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{model}} ({{licensePlate}})? This action cannot be undone and will remove the car from the fleet.
fleet.searchPlaceholder: Search by model or license plate...
fleet.searchNoCarsFound: No cars found matching your search.
fleet.addNewCarDesc: Add a new car to the fleet. Fill in all the required information.
fleet.editCarDesc: Update the car information. You can modify any field.
fleet.carAddedDesc: {{model}} ({{licensePlate}}) has been added to the fleet.
fleet.carDeletedDesc: {{model}} ({{licensePlate}}) has been removed from the fleet.
fleet.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter additional details about the vehicle (optional)
fleet.carDetailsSubtitle: View detailed information about this vehicle and its reservations

browse.title: Browse Fleet
browse.subtitle: Explore our available vehicles and their details

reservations.subtitle: Manage and track all vehicle reservations
reservations.userSubtitle: View and manage your vehicle reservations
reservations.cancellationSuccessDesc: Your reservation for {{car}} has been cancelled
reservations.cancellationRequestedDesc: Your cancellation request for {{car}} has been submitted for admin approval
reservations.cancellationTooLateDesc: Reservations can only be cancelled at least {{hours}} hours in advance
reservations.newReservationDesc: Fill in the details below to create a new vehicle reservation
reservations.commentsPlaceholder: Add any additional comments or special requests
reservations.reservationConfirmedDesc: Your reservation for {{car}} has been confirmed
reservations.reservationSubmittedDesc: Your reservation for {{car}} has been submitted for admin approval
reservations.cancelConfirmation: Are you sure you want to cancel this reservation?
reservations.cancelConfirmationDesc: This will {{action}} your reservation for {{car}} from {{startDate}} to {{endDate}}.

users.subtitle: Manage system users and their roles
users.userDetailsSubtitle: View detailed information about this user and their reservations
users.name: Name
users.searchPlaceholder: Search users by name or email...
users.userDeletedDesc: {{name}}'s profile has been removed from the system
users.userSuspendedDesc: User has been suspended from the system
users.userUnsuspendedDesc: User has been unsuspended and can now access the system
users.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} ({{email}})? This will remove their profile and prevent them from logging in.
users.suspendConfirmation: Are you sure you want to suspend {{name}}?
users.suspendConfirmationDesc: This will prevent {{name}} ({{email}}) from accessing the system until they are unsuspended.
users.unsuspendConfirmation: Are you sure you want to unsuspend {{name}}?
users.unsuspendConfirmationDesc: This will restore {{name}}'s ({{email}}) access to the system.
users.userAlreadyExists: User with this email already exists and has a profile
users.accountExistsWrongPassword: Account exists but password is incorrect. Cannot create user with this email.
users.emailAlreadyInUse: An account with this email address already exists. Please use a different email or contact an administrator if you need to restore a deleted profile.
users.createUserDesc: Fill in the information below to create a new user account.
users.emailCannotBeChanged: Email cannot be changed after account creation
users.createUserNote: Creating a new user will temporarily log you out. You will need to sign in again after user creation.

settings.title: Application Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure system behavior and business rules for the car reservation system
settings.failedToLoadSettings: Failed to load application settings. Please try again.
settings.advanceReservationDesc: Maximum days in advance users can make reservations
settings.maxReservationDurationDesc: Maximum number of days a car can be reserved
settings.advanceCancellationDesc: Minimum hours before start time to allow cancellation
settings.maxConcurrentDesc: Maximum number of active reservations per user
settings.minTimeBetweenReservationsDesc: Minimum hours between reservations for the same user
settings.autoReservationDesc: Automatically approve new reservations without admin confirmation
settings.autoCancellationDesc: Automatically approve cancellation requests without admin confirmation
settings.systemConfigurationDesc: General system settings and business hours
settings.weekendReservationsDesc: Allow users to make reservations for weekends
settings.emailNotificationsDesc: Send email notifications for reservation updates
settings.businessHoursDesc: Set the operating hours for the reservation system
settings.supportEmailsDesc: Enter email addresses for support inquires, one per line
settings.supportEmailsPlaceholder: Enter support email addresses, one per line\nsupport@company.com\nhelp@company.com
